description: Retrieves the details of a voice tone analysis task.

parameters.name: Identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the resource to be updated. Valid values include the ID and ARN of the media insights pipeline.

parameters.name: VoiceToneAnalysisTaskId
parameters.description: The ID of the voice tone analysis task.

nested_items.name: VoiceToneAnalysisTask
nested_items.description: The details of the voice tone analysis task.

nested_items.name: VoiceToneAnalysisTaskId
nested_items.description: The ID of the voice tone analysis task.

nested_items.name: VoiceToneAnalysisTaskStatus
nested_items.description: The status of a voice tone analysis task.

nested_items.name: CreatedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time at which a voice tone analysis task was created.

nested_items.name: UpdatedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time at which a voice tone analysis task was updated.
